parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IMassProperty2.SetOverrideOptions
description: Sets the mass property override options for the selected bodies/components.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverrideOptions( 
   System.Object
Options
,
   System.Int32
Config_option
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if the mass property override options are set successfully, false if not
